title: Senate recesses as 2nd-longest shutdown continues: Live updates
shortDescription: The second-longest government shutdown enters its 24th day with Congress out of session and the funding lapse heading toward next week.

title: Trump pardons crypto king. Who else has he freed?
shortDescription: Trump has previously pardoned political supporters, personal friends, and other close associates.

title: Controversy has shadowed all major (and minor) White House changes
shortDescription: Personal tastes of presidents - as well as the demands of a growing federal government - has helped dictate changes over time to the White House.

title: Trump ends trade talks with Canada after Ronald Reagan ad
shortDescription: Trump ended trade talks with Canada after an advertisement featuring former President Ronald Reagan spoke negatively about tariffs.

title: What to know about Graham Platner, Maine Democrat running for Senate
shortDescription: Maine's Democratic candidate for the U.S. Senate is getting national attention. But who is he and why?

title: Maine Senate candidate covers controversial tattoo
shortDescription: A Democratic Senate candidate from Maine, Graham Platner, said he covered up a tattoo resembling a Nazi symbol that he got nearly two decades ago.

title: Donald Trump stands by Jan. 6 pardon after rioter charged in new crime
shortDescription: Christopher Moynihan, 34, was charged with one felony count of making a terroristic threat. In 2023, he was sentenced to prison on Jan. 6 charges.

title: Chelsea Clinton is 'unsettled' by Donald Trump's White House renovation
shortDescription: In an op-ed published in USA TODAY, Chelsea Clinton said she's 'unsettled' by Donald Trump's White House overhaul.

title: White House responds to concerns on East Wing demolition
shortDescription: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt responded to concerns regarding Trump's $300 million ballroom that requires tearing down the East Wing.

title: Pilot unions urge Congress to pass Republican bill to end shutdown
shortDescription: Three pilot unions called on Congress to end the government shutdown by passing the Republican-backed continuing resolution.

title: Trump pardons convicted Binance founder
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has pardoned convicted Binance founder Changpeng Zhao, a move anti-corruption advocates are criticizing.

title: Trump calls for cheaper cattle, more land to cut cost of beef
shortDescription: The Trump administration urged cattle ranchers to lower prices while announcing efforts to rebuild the country's decimated cattle herd.

title: Trump says Argentina is 'dying' and 'fighting for its life'
shortDescription: U.S. President Donald Trump, speaking onboard Air Force One on Sunday (October 19), defended a proposed beef import deal with Argentina, emphasizing its potential impact on reducing domestic beef prices while supporting Argentina's struggling economy.

title: Trump said he builds 'on budget.' Then ballroom cost went up by 50%.
shortDescription: Trump has frequently played up his builder bona fides – and slammed others for their lack of expertise and for cost overruns on projects.

title: White House names donors for ballroom
shortDescription: The White House named 37 donors, including tech giants and wealthy benefactors and major corporations for the $300M East Wing ballroom project.

title: Trump's White House demolition couldn't be stopped. Here's why.
shortDescription: President Trump's demolition of the White House East Wing to make way for his new ballroom exposed a "loophole" in the nation's main preservation law.

title: See scenes from demolition of East Wing of the White House
shortDescription: Construction crews continued the demolition of the East Wing of the White House on Thursday, Oct. 23. Photos captured the scene at the worksite.

title: Trump pauses deployment of federal agents to San Francisco
shortDescription: President Donald Trump agreed to give San Francisco Mayor Daniel Lurie more time to "make his city better on his own."

title: An 'insult.' In whirlwind Israel tour, Vance slams West Bank annexation vote
shortDescription: In a whirlwind trip to Israel to help salvage Trump's ceasefire deal, Vance weighed in on Netanyahu politics and toured the Church of the Holy Sepulchre.

title: Tourists unhappy with White House demolition
shortDescription: USA TODAY's White House Correspondent Zac Anderson spoke to tourists who flocked to the White House to get a look at the construction.

title: Will Trump cancel his Asia trip due to the government shutdown?
shortDescription: With no end in sight for the government shutdown, Trump is expected to visit Malaysia, Japan and South Korea during a multi-day trip to Asia.

title: Trump pardons convicted Binance founder Zhao, White House says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has pardoned convicted Binance founder Changpeng Zhao, a White House official said on Oct. 23.

title: Who is paying for the East Wing ballroom? See White House list.
shortDescription: The demolition of the East Wing is underway, but as estimated costs rise, who is footing the bill to build the ballroom?
